org.stekikun.dolmen.codegen

Class DecisionTree.Split

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stekikun.dolmen.codegen.DecisionTree
      • org.stekikun.dolmen.codegen.DecisionTree.Split
  • Enclosing class:
    DecisionTree

    public static final class DecisionTree.Split
extends DecisionTree
    An implementation of DecisionTree which represents a binary choice with respect to some pivot character:
    • every character below or equal to the pivot is mapped to the result of a recursive decision tree left
    • every character higher than the pivot is mapped to the result of a recursive decision tree right
    This implementation is used as an internal node to implement binary decision trees. NB: Note that the transitions in left and right recursive subtrees are only relevant for the intervals resp. below and above the pivot, which means it is possible to use DecisionTree.Return as a leaf and it will only be applied to some sub-interval.
    Author:
    St√©phane Lescuyer
